app.title: Type Quest
app.subtitle: Master touch typing with retro flair

home_row_basic.title: Home Row Basics
home_row_basic.description: Learn the foundation keys under your fingers
home_row_basic.concept: Place your fingers on the home row keys. Your left hand covers A, S, D, F and your right hand covers J, K, L, ;. The small bumps on F and J help you find these keys without looking.

home_row_extended.title: Home Row Extended
home_row_extended.description: Add G and H to complete the home row
home_row_extended.concept: The G and H keys are typed with your index fingers by moving them inward from F and J. Practice smooth transitions between these keys.

top_row_vowels.title: Top Row Vowels
top_row_vowels.description: Learn E and I - essential vowels
top_row_vowels.concept: E is typed with your left middle finger moving up from D. I is typed with your right middle finger moving up from K. These are among the most common letters.

top_row_index.title: Top Row Index
top_row_index.description: Add R and U with your index fingers
top_row_index.concept: R and U are typed by reaching up with your index fingers. R from F position, U from J position. Keep your other fingers on the home row.

top_row_ring.title: Top Row Ring
top_row_ring.description: Learn W and O with ring fingers
top_row_ring.concept: W and O require your ring fingers to reach up from S and L. This movement takes practice - focus on returning to home position.

top_row_pinky.title: Top Row Pinky
top_row_pinky.description: Challenge your pinkies with Q and P
top_row_pinky.concept: Q and P are pinky stretches. Q from A position, P from ; position. Pinkies are weaker, so take your time building strength and accuracy.

top_row_complete.title: Top Row Complete
top_row_complete.description: Master T and Y to complete the top row
top_row_complete.concept: T and Y are central keys typed with index fingers. T reaches up-right from F, Y reaches up-left from J. You now know the entire top row!

bottom_row_middle_index.title: Bottom Row Start
bottom_row_middle_index.description: Begin the bottom row with C and M
bottom_row_middle_index.concept: C and M introduce the bottom row. C is typed with your left middle finger reaching down from D. M is typed with your right index finger reaching down from J.

bottom_row_index.title: Bottom Row Index
bottom_row_index.description: Add V and N with index fingers
bottom_row_index.concept: V and N are typed with index fingers reaching down. V from F position, N from J position. The bottom row requires a downward curl of your fingers.

bottom_row_ring.title: Bottom Row Ring
bottom_row_ring.description: Learn X and comma with ring fingers
bottom_row_ring.concept: X and the comma key use your ring fingers. These require a longer reach down from S and L. Practice smooth, controlled movements.

bottom_row_pinky.title: Bottom Row Pinky
bottom_row_pinky.concept: Z and period are the final regular keys. Z is the ultimate pinky stretch. Period ends sentences - get comfortable with this punctuation.

complete_keyboard.title: Complete Keyboard
complete_keyboard.description: Add B and master the spacebar
complete_keyboard.concept: B is typed with your left index finger reaching down and right. The spacebar should be typed with your thumb. You now have access to the full keyboard!

full_practice.title: Full Practice
full_practice.concept: Time to put it all together. Practice typing real words and sentences using every key you've learned. Focus on smooth, rhythmic typing.

speed_building.title: Speed Building
speed_building.concept: Now that accuracy is solid, let's build speed. Try to type faster while maintaining at least 95% accuracy. Speed will come naturally with practice.

mastery.title: Mastery
mastery.concept: You've learned all the keys. Continue practicing to build muscle memory. The goal is to type without thinking about key positions.

typing.start: Click here or press any key to start
